summary: The bill, titled the "Protecting Children from Experimentation Act of 2025," seeks to amend Title 18, Chapter 110 of the United States Code to prohibit gender transition procedures on minors. It defines gender transition procedures broadly, including hormonal interventions and surgeries. The bill outlines circumstances under which the prohibition applies, involving interstate or foreign commerce. It also includes definitions for terms like "female," "male," "minor," and "gender transition procedure," while providing exclusions for certain medical conditions and treatments and states that no person on whom the procedure is performed or arrested or prosecuted for an offense under this section and that a civil action can be brought against anyone who performed said procedures..
